ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
3 large eggs, or more as needed
2 cups milk, or more as needed
½ cup seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)

cookingTips: Maintain oil temperature at 350°F for crispy, golden shrimp
Double-dredging in egg wash and flour mixture creates extra crunch
Fry in batches to avoid overcrowding and maintain temperature
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This fried shrimp relies on proper oil temperature and technique for the perfect crispy exterior. Help the cook understand why temperature control is crucial to avoid greasy results.
